text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea falcifera is an endangered species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family.
text.Distribution: It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea falcifera". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33412A9781499. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33412A9781499.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
